title: OpenFormatCodes​
content: </> TextStyling.OpenFormatCodes( parsedText: string,-- The text that will be parsed activeFormats: {string}-- This table stores the active format codes currently in use ) → string This function is for opening the font tags for format codes.

title: CloseFormatCodes​
content: </> TextStyling.CloseFormatCodes( parsedText: string,-- The text that will be parsed activeFormats: {string},-- This table stores the active format codes currently in use clearFormat: boolean?-- When this is true it will remove all of the currently active format codes ) → string This function is for closing the font tags for format codes.

title: ParseTextCodes​
content: </> TextStyling.ParseTextCodes(text: string) → string This function takes in a text and when any colour codes are found they will be converted into font rich text format.

title: StripRichText​
content: </> TextStyling.StripRichText(text: string) → () This function strips all rich text away from text leaving just the plain text.
